column4: I was able to edit grub_default to what i need, but when i run sudo update-grub I get/etc/default/grub: 18: http://www.dedoimedo.com/computers/grub-2.html: not found
I'm totally new to ubuntu, so i have no clue why i get this
I don't know why it comes up. I visited this website a while ago for some grub 2 tutorial
how it comes up in terminal i dont know
why are you in the bootloader ? and you total new to this,. thats like messing with your car starter
